name: 100% Pure Beeswax Rolled Pair Honeycomb Tapers
description: These 100% sustainable beeswax tapers are handrolled by me and have a burn time of 4.5 hours using 100% cotton wicks. No artificial fragrances or fillers - perfect for your green home!  12 colors available: apricot, black, blue, burgundy, eggplant, green, ivory, mauve, natural, red, rose, sunflower. Rose and natural are pictured here. If you'd like to see a picture of all colors, please ask.  Sold as a pair!

name: Beeswax Carved Easter Egg Non-Toxic Candle Pillar
description: This beautiful carved egg will make the perfect centerpiece for your Easter dinner!  It is 2.5" x 3.75" and has an incredible burn time of 34 hours.  Beeswax is 100% natural, sustainable, and burns hotter, brighter, and much, much longer than soy or paraffin.  Plus, it contains none of the toxins found in virtually all mass produced candles.  All of my candles are handmade by me on my Northern California organic farm.

name: 100% Pure Beeswax Spiral Pair Tapers Candles
description: These beautiful spirals are one of my best sellers at farmers' markets here locally.  They are 7.5" in height and have a burn time of 4.5 hours each.  If you've never tried beeswax candles, you are in for a treat!  They burn clean, hot, and much, much longer than paraffin or soy, plus they contain NO fillers or artificial additives.  Many say, like honey, beeswax contains healing properties - -some studies have shown that beeswax produces negative ions in the air, which are said to have positive effects on our mood.  Try a pair for yourself today!

name: Beeswax Diamond Pillar Sustainable Candle
description: This beautiful candle is perfect for many occasions - and is 100% natural and sustainable.  I make all of my candles on my organic farm here in Northern California and sell produce, wool, and beeswax products at the local farmers' markets.  I'm posting my top 5 sellers on Big Cartel, with hopes of adding the rest if sales go well!  This candle stands 4.5" high and has a burn time of 18 hours.  Beeswax burns bright, hot, and much, much longer than soy or paraffin and without all the toxic chemicals found in conventional candles.

name: Long Burning Beeswax Thick Emergency Pillar Taper Candle
description: This pillar/taper is great for emergencies, gatherings, ceremonies, etc as it has a burn time of over 31 hours!  It is 6.5" tall x 1.5" and is made of pure, sustainable, all natural beeswax and has a 100% cotton braided wick.  Beeswax burns bright, hot, and much, much longer than paraffin or soy candles, which are full of additives and toxins.  All my candles are made by me, with close attention to finishing details.  You are supporting local, California beekeepers with each purchase!
